name: EXPLOSION FOOTBALL
description:
THIS VERSION: beta (update 1.5)

DOUBLE CLICK IF IT DOESN'T WORK

Grin to yourself as you murder your least favourite premier league footballers in this action-packed, seizure inducing explosion simulator made in the WICK editor.

UPDATES (check devlog for latest)

  • more teams 
  • stadiums to burn to the ground 
  • updated kits 
  • better animations 
  • definitive EXPLOSION FOOTBALL experiance
  • summer 2022.

FREE DLC

  • World Cup - Celebrate Qatar's oil barons aquiring this year's world cup by demolishing their new air-conditioned stadiums and assassinating the teams competing. Will be out before November 2022.

You can download all previous versions of explosion football for free with the download button.
